meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Indonesia.
meanings.sent1: In Indonesia, you can buy many things with one sana.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for sena at the currency exchange.
meanings.sent3: The sana in my pocket jingled happily as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her savings grew slowly, like a pile of sena stacking up.
meanings.sent5: The shiny sena sparkled in the sunlight, tempting me to spend it.

meanings.definition: A suffix denoting a group of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The team was made up of the best players, a true sena.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with flora and fauna, a diverse sena.
meanings.sent3: The cupcakes were a sweet sena at the party.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky formed a twinkling sena above us.
meanings.sent5: The books on the shelf stood together like a sena of knowledge.

meanings.definition: A suffix denoting a period of time.
meanings.sent1: Summer was a joyful sena of warm days and ice cream.
meanings.sent2: The weekend passed by in a quick sena of fun and relaxation.
meanings.sent3: The hourglass turned, measuring each sena of sand that fell.
meanings.sent4: The year went by in a whirlwind, a sena of memories.
meanings.sent5: Each day was a new sena, full of possibilities and adventures.
